  • Show:

  • Anonymous
  • USA, Female, 18-24
  • Novice Nomad
  • 3 reviews
23rd Nov 2017
9.4

Great location, great staff, and a great atmosphere for travelers! Would highly recommend for meeting new people and for those who are looking to have fun and enjoy Amsterdam!

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 10.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 8.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. We are so happy that you had a great stay in Amsterdam. We hope you left over some hotspots for your next visit. Thanks again and safe travels! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • Anonymous
  • Scotland, Male, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 3 reviews
19th Nov 2017
9.1

The staff make the place what is it, that and superb location. The people at reception, the bar staff and the cleaners, everyone was excellent. Most things within 15mins. Extend the smoking area hours and this place would be perfect.

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Amazing! It's is so great to receive such kind words about all our staff. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and we definitely hope to see you back again. Once more thank you and safe travels! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • ozzie43955792
  • Australia, Male, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 2 reviews
19th Nov 2017
9.4

Great atmosphere, great staff, great location!

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Awesome! Thank you for this great score and safe travels! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • Anonymous
  • Australia, Male, 31-40
  • Novice Nomad
  • 8 reviews
18th Nov 2017
8.9

Easy to get around from this spot, looks to be a popular place. Sheets changed daily. Lift access. No issues here.

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 8.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Yes thank you so much for this great review! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • laracochrane6095
  • Australia, Female, 31-40
  • Novice Nomad
  • 2 reviews
17th Nov 2017
9.1

great hostel if you want to get amongst it. staff were super friendly. bar downstairs is always full. good breakfast & i was stoked on getting a fresh towel everyday .. wouldnt recommend if you're after a chill stay - this is a party place in the middle of party town.

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 8.0Location
    • 10.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • England, Female, 18-24
  • Novice Nomad
  • 6 reviews
15th Nov 2017
7.7

The room was a good size, clean and simple. Lockers were a good size too. Location was great for museums and sights, however the beer garden beneath the window was very loud - even with earplugs! Rooms were also boiling and uncomfortable through the night, luckily there was a fan (which was also very noisy!) but it made it bearable. The restaurant downstairs was reasonably priced with discount for being a guest of the hostel. Overall, worth the stay but probably wouldn’t rush back!

    • 6.0Value For Money
    • 8.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 6.0Facilities
    • 8.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 8.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Thank you for this feedback. We are sorry to hear that the our beer garden was too loud for you and that the room was too warm, we will sent our maintenance team to have a look at it! The beer garden does close at 11 pm so it can provide any discomfort for our guests in the evening. All our room are equipped with heaters which can be turned off. We are happy to read that you enjoyed our location and your room. Thank again for this feedback. - St. Christopher's at The Winston-

  • Anonymous
  • England, Female, 18-24
  • Novice Nomad
  • 1 review
14th Nov 2017
9.7

Nice and clean hostel, great location with a bar down stairs and a night club next door if you're looking for convenience. The beds are comfortable, bathroom is nice and spacious. Recommended and I would defo stay again.

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 10.0Facilities
    • 8.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. We think our location is ideal for travelers. We are happy you enjoyed all our facilities, great location, rocking bar and had a good night sleep in our comfy beds. We hope to see you and your friends again. Thank you once more, safe travels! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • Anonymous
  • USA, Female, 31-40
  • Novice Nomad
  • 3 reviews
14th Nov 2017
8.6

Pretty good hostel. Rooms in the women's dorm were pretty basic and smelled a bit musty. Nice that the beds are all singles and not bunks. Also, the towels are included in the price and there's good size lockers in the bedrooms (bring your own lock). It is VERY loud outside at night due to the bar/club below, so bring earplugs. Bar area has a good size crowd and lively feel, which makes it easy to meet people.

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 6.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 8.0Atmosphere
    • 8.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

Thank you for this nice review! We are happy to read that you have a great time in our hostel. We do have a lively rock bar (with an inside smoking area), a beer garden and a night club, indeed great places to meet fellow travelers. Being above a bar we agree, it can get a bit noisy at times. All rooms are provided with clean sheets, fresh towels and each bed has it's own locker. Padlocks are available are reception and we also provide free earplugs! Happy and safe travels - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

  • Anonymous
  • England, Male, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 1 review
13th Nov 2017
10.0

I had a great stay, I’m terrible with names but the young Australian girl that checked me in, she has great customer service skills. Highly recommended place

    • 10.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 10.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 10.0Cleanliness
  • Anonymous
  • Croatia, Male, 25-30
  • Novice Nomad
  • 2 reviews
13th Nov 2017
9.1

Location - perfect, best one I've ever been to (so close to center for such a low a price Atmosphere- amazing, rock styled hostel with a themed bar/restaurant holding excellent food, fine selection of drink, excellent breakfast offer Smoking room on ground floor And on top of it all, the staff is F...king AMAZING. Thanks, and hope we see each other very soon :)

    • 8.0Value For Money
    • 10.0Security
    • 10.0Location
    • 8.0Facilities
    • 10.0Staff
    • 10.0Atmosphere
    • 8.0Cleanliness
View Property Reply

YES! Wow reading this review puts a smile on our face! We will show it to our staff. We have a great central location in the red light district, a rocking bar, booming nightclub, delicious menu and continental breakfast. Thank again! - St. Christopher's at The Winston -

title: Reviews of St Christopher's at The Winston in Amsterdam
